summary: Provided comprehensive guide on enabling Exa search engine. The implementation is already complete in the codebase but requires an EXA_API_KEY environment variable to function. Explained the setup process, current features, and verification methods. Exa searches crunchbase.com, linkedin.com, angel.co, and techcrunch.com with enhanced queries and appears with green badges in results.
current_status: Exa search engine is fully implemented and ready to use once the user adds their API key to .env.local file. The system will automatically integrate Exa results with other search engines and display them with distinctive green badges.
